known_issues: Deployment/build failed during push to network (deployment error).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Clean circular 'EX' logo on transparent background (exam-xpresss-logo-clean.dim_512x512.png)
- Red circular 'EX' favicon icon on transparent background (exam-xpresss-favicon.dim_32x32.png)
- Red circular 'EX' app icon on transparent background (exam-xpresss-icon.dim_192x192.png)
- Red circular 'EX' app icon on transparent background (exam-xpresss-icon.dim_512x512.png)

## Edit Images
- Remove any watermark/artifacts and export a clean transparent logo asset (IMG_20260121_194813_007-removebg-preview-3.png > exam-xpresss-logo-clean.dim_512x512.png)
- Remove any watermark/artifacts and export a clean transparent logo asset (IMG_20260121_194813_007-removebg-preview-4.png > exam-xpresss-logo-clean.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create clean, watermark-free Exam Xpresss logo assets from the user-uploaded logo image(s) and add them as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Generate favicon/app icon PNGs from the clean logo and ensure the app uses them in the HTML document head.

Update/verify UI branding to use the Exam Xpresss logo as the primary brand mark in the header and remove any visible 'Caffeine AI' / 'caffeine.ai' branding across the UI (including footer attribution).
Resolve the build/deployment failure so the project successfully builds and deploys to the Internet Computer without errors.
